VrS19.1b huδā̊biiō] sec. Bartholomae, Kellens, cod.; Geldner huδābiiō.

VrS19.1c frāiiə̄bīšcat̰ca] sec. Bartholomae, Kellens; Geldner frāiiebīšcat̰ca; frāiiə̄bīšcat̰ca only in Ind. cod. (4200, 4210, 4240, 4515), but Ir. cod. (passim vid. Apparatus) frāiiaēbīšcat̰ca can go back to -ə̄-, but not to -e-.
